website_summaries.verdict: Electric model is safe for cheese, chocolate, oil, broth, and much more. Offers modern design and spacious capacity.
pros: Electric temperature control makes it possible to create lots of recipes, and stainless steel bowl provides a nonstick interior
Has an attractive stainless steel design and comes with 8 fondue forks
cons: The cord is only 1 foot long
Temperatures aren't easy to control, and it tends to cook hot

website_summaries.verdict: Top-quality fondue pot that can handle cheese, chocolate, and oil.
pros: Big enough for eight fondue forks to be used at once
Stainless steel construction looks great on counter tops
Comes with adjustable temperature control probe
Comes with a three-year limited warranty
cons: The fondue forks that are included in this set are very small

customer_reviews.title: Look no further!  This is it!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I am IMPRESSED! I did lots of research on electric fondue sets before deciding to purchase this one. I love this thing! It heats up super quick, the temperature adjusts to the setting you want just as quickly. Easy cleanup. I have put it in the dishwasher several times with no issues. I have recently purchased a 2nd one.
customer_reviews.author: Mel's Market Place

customer_reviews.title: Great design!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and I each bought one so we can lend them to one another for parties. One design feature I love is that the electric cord is designed similarly to my power cord on my Apple laptop. It is magnetic, so if someone catches the cord, it just detaches rather than pulling hot oil or cheese on someone. That was my one reserve about buying a corded pot...but they solved that issue. The pots work beautifully, is well made and has a very pretty design.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy J.

customer_reviews.title: Great fondue maker
customer_reviews.text: Great fondue maker. I wish the cord was a lot longer, but I used an extension cord with a grounder to solve the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Fondue Pot!
customer_reviews.text: I used used this pot the first time for cheese fondue and was most impressed with the temperature control. It was very consistent at the #3 setting--no adjusting needed. I would have given it 5 stars but for the somewhat flimsy and unstable fork rest. This should be modified for a more secure fit.
customer_reviews.author: Gumbo Gal

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a great product for the price. We only have fondue night one or twice a year and this seems to fit our needs well. We have young children so I try to avoid open flames, which is why I chose this pot. I prepared the cheese and the chocolate courses in the pot and then unplugged and transferred it to the dining table. I was worried that the fondue would cool quickly without the heat, but it maintained enough heat to keep the food warm during the meal. It is a little difficult to clean well with the electronic end, but that's to be expected.
customer_reviews.author: Barbie S.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for melting chocolate!
customer_reviews.text: This is way easier than a double boiler. Chocolate will melt and stay melted on the 1.5 setting. Easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not all are created equal.
customer_reviews.text: I have one of these exact same pots and I bought a second to match. But I was disappointed that little differences in quality made it undesirable to even use. The lid that the sticks sit on while your oil is cooking/chocolate is coating falls in because it doesn’t quite fit the pot. Huge issue for an oil and still problematic for chocolate. It’s better to just keep it off because if bumped, the ring will be swimming. So while I would recommend my year old version, there must me something slightly different with the 2019 production.
customer_reviews.author: Helen Adkins

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully designed; works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: First used for 4 adults and 2 children, it was a joy. It's easy to prepare for its first use, and then – with a heavy-duty extension cord, worked perfectly in the center of our table. Heats quickly, maintains the temperature, and cleans easily. We will use it often for the two of us for other than cheese fondue. It's too useful to let it sit and wait for company. And the price is excellent!
customer_reviews.author: twigs

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so that we could start a new Christmas tradition with my family, and it was a success! This is perfect for broth fondues since you have the ability to turn the temperature way up. We've also made a cheese fondue and it was perfect! I also like that the cord is held together by a magnet so if anyone happens to trip on the cord, only the cord will detach instead of the pot (with boiling broth) falling with it. My in-laws wanted to know where I bought this because it was so good!
customer_reviews.author: Pana

customer_reviews.title: Nice fondue pot
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used the fondue pot for cheese & chocolate fondues so far. Following the directions for temperatures both melted quickly and stayed at just the right temperature. We just used them for a fondue dinner so it wasn’t left on for an extended period. Both cleaned up easily. The one thing I would have liked would be to have the pot separate from the heating element so that you could submerge it in the sink. It does not separate so you have to wash it out a little more carefully. But since the non-stick coating works great it’s only a minor inconvenience. Overall I’m very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie M

customer_reviews.title: Be careful
customer_reviews.text: Be careful if you are working with cheese. While making/serving queso the temp was hard to control (unless monitoring is constant). Mine now has a dark brown ring where the heating element resides below the cooking chamber.
customer_reviews.author: Omidar

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I looked at a bunch of sets. This one is worth it Looked better than the picture! Was a gift for my mom can't wait for her to try it out ! Came in a nice package as well nothing broken
customer_reviews.author: Yvette lopez

customer_reviews.title: The best product I have ever used for fonduing meats and ...
customer_reviews.text: The best product I have ever used for fonduing meats and vegetables. It kept a constant heat and didn't create the mess I am used to when fonduing. I now have three for our family celebrations when we fondue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thermostat does not work. It gets too hot too quickly.
customer_reviews.text: It is hard to regulate the temperature even though there is a thermostat. Mine might be defective, not sure but it either does not warm the cheese or burns it. I stir and check it all the time but the cheese still burns at the bottom which makes the container difficult to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Those People

customer_reviews.title: Fondue Pots Have Come a Long Way!
customer_reviews.text: Fondue pots have come a LONG way!!! I still remember when they all came with a can of sterno that you had to light, and there was no such thing as temperature control. THIS fondue pot is amazing. So incredibly easy to use and make fondue in. Controls temperature really well. The only thing I dont like is the electric cord is way to short! You definitely need to use an extension cord or risk having the pot get pulled off the table. Otherwise, a great fondue pot! I definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: cao

customer_reviews.title: An ideal fondue pot.
customer_reviews.text: We have a 55+ year old family Christmas Swiss fondue tradition. As each of the grandkids gets married, I gift them a fondue pot to further the tradition in their own family. This is my favorite. I have bought 7 of this model so far.
customer_reviews.author: HMS

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Fondue Pot
customer_reviews.text: With the pandemic going on I bought this to celebrate my husband and I's anniversary. It came with a great little booklet too that helps you determine what temperatures to put the fondue pot at in order to maintain the correct temperatures. Our kids enjoy using it for chocolate fondue. We made cheese, broth and chocolate fondue with ease. It is easy to clean and easy to use. One of the downfalls of this product though is the length of the power cord. We had to pull out an extension cord so that we could properly enjoy the fondue at our dinner table. Other than that I would highly recommend this brand.
customer_reviews.author: addsnhere

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Everything works as advertised and my wife and I love it! First night I used it was to make 3 fondue courses for my wife’s birthday; cheese, chicken/steak/potato’s/cauliflower/, and chocolate with strawberries/bananas/marshmallows. In between courses I put some water in the pot and let it sit for a few mins, all the leftovers wiped rights out with zero issue. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Works great for us!
customer_reviews.text: Husband wanted a fondue set for Christmas and I said we wouldn't use it- everyone says that. BUT, we do and a lot- we love it! This one is easy to use and a crowd pleaser, even for the kiddos. Not the easiest to clean, but that's really just with the cheese recipes (which of course, are a pain to clean out in any pot). Temperature control is perfect for the kids and the colored skewers make it easy to keep yours from not getting lost with the others. I did get a recipe book too, which I think is helpful to incentivize us to use it!
customer_reviews.author: TKW Denver

customer_reviews.title: A great night in.
customer_reviews.text: The product is good quality and very elegant. Unfortunately, the “lid” doesn’t fit very well and at times feels like it’s a hazard. Overall, it’s a great piece to sit around with friends and family. My advice, get two! One for oil and the other for cheese.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Melting Pot at home!
customer_reviews.text: This is worth it!! My boyfriend and I LOVE going to the Melting Pot, but’s it’s so expensive to frequent. I bought this fondue pot trying to recreate their food and let me tell you it worked AMAZINGLY! We boiled our meats in red wine and added spices, etc. and it was almost exactly the same. Definitely buy this if you’re thinking about it!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Great Fondue Pot!
customer_reviews.text: After a friend had a fondue dinner party on New Year's Eve, I just had to have one! One of the fondue pots she had was the Cuisinart and it seemed to work better than the others. So the next day I searched Amazon and after reading the reviews I ordered. Since receiving we have used this once or twice a week and love it! Works wonderfully and so easy to clean. Might have to buy another one!
customer_reviews.author: Suzie

customer_reviews.title: As good as it gets!
customer_reviews.text: Our old one went out on us. Here we go buy a new one. Found this one and read all the reviews until it finally hit us this was the one. It gets hot fast keep it to medium and sit and watch the magic begin. It comes with a nice little book that gives out a few receipts and it was great. We try to use it as much as possible and very easy to clean. We just decided to clean by hand. Again, it gets hot fast and you need to supervise, no going off to watch a tv show or have a conversation about Existentialism with Suri.
customer_reviews.author: Me109glen

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!
customer_reviews.text: I actually ordered this one and another brand and the Cuisinart is by far the better Fondue maker. Its sturdy, easy to clean ( a huge deal) and heats up in a flash. I used sterno in the past and I didn't realize how much easier a electric fondue maker would be. I wish I had bought two of these honestly for fondue parties. My only complaint is the short electrical cord. You have to be vey close to an outlet to use. I think that was a safety feature.
customer_reviews.author: tara7

customer_reviews.title: A great appliance for fondue lovers!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! Easy to clean, accurate temperature control, powerful electric heating element, stylish, features safety magnetic plug, the family loves fondue bourguignonne. A great appliance for fondue lovers and a variety of situations. You will definitively will not go wrong with this product. This is NOT a paid or fake review, I am a consumer just like you that wants to get the best from a pleasant Amazon shopping experience. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: carevalo

customer_reviews.title: This works really well.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my bday to have fondue. We used it for frying meat dipped in batter and then did chocolate fondue for dessert. We set it up on the dining room table and there were 5 of us. It was a little difficult cooking bite size pieces for 5 people. This would work better for just a couple of people. I think I'll try using broth next time or just use it for cheese and chocolate fondue. Other than that it is a very nice fondue set and works really well.
customer_reviews.author: Marcy

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product as a gift so my boyfriend and I can make fondue together. So far we have used it to make cheese fondue, chocolate fondue, and we have used it for oil to cook meats and vegetables. It is super easy to use and everything we've made so far has tasted great. Cleaning it is kind of annoying just based on the shape and bulkiness, but that's to be expected.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth N

customer_reviews.title: Best family purchase ever for our kitchen!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this fondue set!!!! I didn’t know what to expect as far as size but it’s perfect!!! We took our kids to the melting pot and they loved it. I thought, let’s order a fondue and we can have it whenever. As soon as we got the fondue set, I cleaned it and made our first fondue. It was easy! My son made the chocolate as you can see in the video. It turned out great! I highly recommend!!!! We will be doing cheese fondue tonight along with a broth base for our meats. Yes, I bought two so we could do two fondues at once.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fondue Safely
customer_reviews.text: This is a great option for making fondues with hot oil -- no open flame! I have used this several times now with success. It is great to use for parties to keep hot dips or sauces warm. Clean up is easy too.
customer_reviews.author: flyingdameNYC

customer_reviews.title: Great Entertainment Piece!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this fondue pot specifically for a new queso dip I wanted to make for a party. I looked at many different styles and sizes and ordered this one because (1) Cuisinart has a good reputation for being high quality; (2) the pot size was larger than many others; and (3) the inside is non-stick. I had the queso dip on low for about 4 hours. It never stuck to the bottom of the pot and cleanup was so easy. Glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Pool

customer_reviews.title: Short cord
customer_reviews.text: This is fine, except that the power cord is too short. An electric fondue pot should be able to be plugged in at the table without an extension cord.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Ridiculously short cord
customer_reviews.text: Unless your guests can gather around a surface right next to an outlet, the ridiculously short cord necessitates the use of an extension cord. The two piece temperature control/outlet connection is tenuous. Not what I expect from Cuisinart but perhaps this is reflected in the price point. Otherwise works well.
customer_reviews.author: Elisabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great Fondue Starter Kit
customer_reviews.text: This is the bomb. I love the big bowl, how easy it is to clean, and the general use of it. I think the biggest issue which is what pulls it from a 5/5 for me to a 4/5 is the fact the cord is only 2ft. Why? We had to use an extension cord because of this but it worked fine. I also think because there is a lot of surface area with this and volume to the pot in general, if your recipe for cheese fondue calls for say, 1 Cup of wine, maybe half it. Overall solid purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy with the quality
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with the quality... other than it states not to use an extension cord, but the cord supplied is just over a foot long....how on earth does that make sense?
customer_reviews.author: christee

customer_reviews.title: Makes for a fun fondue dinner!
customer_reviews.text: We were worried about switching between the cheese, broth, and chocolate fondues, but the pot was super easy to clean and warmed up quickly. Nice, even melt with no burning. We've only used it once, but we will definitely get our money's worth out of this small appliance!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Like the Melting Pot for your home
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this after our first trip to The Melting Pot when we decided we loved fondue and needed one of these at home! Great product, good size, easy to use. I particularly liked that the skewer sticks have different colored ends so you can tell whose stick belongs to who.
customer_reviews.author: inthebreeze03

customer_reviews.title: Great fondue maker!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. THERE ARE SPECIAL INSTRUCTIONS FOR FIRST USE - don't skip them - but otherwise this product is super easy to use and clean. It heats evenly and the heat adjusts well. Wish I knew of more things to make in a fondue pan than just cheese dip because it's just so simple!
customer_reviews.author: ACTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: ok
customer_reviews.text: Fun to have, but the temperature is difficult to control. It bubbles up easily. Then you turn it down a little, and it cools too much. Hard to regulate to the exact temp you want. It cleans easily. The electrical cord holds on magnetically, which I suppose is a good thing. If you were to trip on the cord, it would fall out rather than take down the entire pot.
customer_reviews.author: Gaia

customer_reviews.title: Bought to give as a gift
customer_reviews.text: we bought two of these to be given as gifts therefore what we can rate is very limited. That said, we did unpack them completely and they appear to be well made from good quality materials and are what you expect from the Cuisinart brand. We feel comfortable giving them as gifts and that the recipients are getting a quality product that they can use and enjoy for years.
customer_reviews.author: William K.

customer_reviews.title: Not dishwasher safe like the sticker on it said.
customer_reviews.text: As far as using it goes its fine. The temp controls could be better. A small twist is a huge temp difference. But I’m totally ticked bc the sticker on the side said it was dishwasher safe and after one run the bottom is rusting.
customer_reviews.author: Helen Jane McLean

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for a hard to please recipient!
customer_reviews.text: This little pot was bought on a whim for a Christmas gift, and I was so excited when the person was THRILLED with it! They made a delicious cheese fondue the next day which they said was incredibly easy to make, and the pot itself was easy to clean afterward. I love how the skewers have colored ends to designate who is using it. It looks small but can hold a lot!
customer_reviews.author: KLSC

customer_reviews.title: Love this fondue maker
customer_reviews.text: Love this fondue maker, works great for broth, cheese or chocolate. The pot shuts off when it hits the right temperature which is a nice feature to have. Have used this multiple times already since we've gotten it and have added fondue to our meals on a weekly basis.
customer_reviews.author: Ali-Saihati

customer_reviews.title: No burned cheese here
customer_reviews.text: I debated buying this product due to some of the negative reviews I read. We received this yesterday and put it to immediate use last night. Followed the directions and everything worked perfectly. Kids loved eating their vegetables this way. For that reason alone it is worth buying. We are going to do chocolate for Friday movie night. Will update review if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: J. Glidden

customer_reviews.title: Defective after 30 days
customer_reviews.text: After a handful of uses over a month time period, there is an obvious defect in the unit - there is what appears to be a burn mark in the exact shape of the heating unit (see photo). This fondue pot is also not one of the easier ones to clean as it doesn’t disconnect from the element the cord connects to. Overall, completely unsatisfied with the fact that after a month, just after the return period of 30 days ended, the machine is useless as I don’t trust cooking food in this with the way it has burned the unit.
customer_reviews.author: RH

customer_reviews.title: I love these little pots!
customer_reviews.text: Fondue is very popular with y family and friends and over the years we've all converted to these electric pots over the old flame versions. Not only are they safer, but the superior ability to control temperature for cheese, broth, and chocolate make these a significant improvement. And the ease of cleaning makes everyone happy. This is my third, because I like to have options when serving fondue!
customer_reviews.author: Sean Wanderer

customer_reviews.title: I would Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: So far it's been great, the only bad thing about this fondue maker is that you can't put it in the dishwasher and it's hard to clean with the attachment on the side without getting it wet. Other than that we have already used it for cheese and chocolate fondue and have no complaints, it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Easy to clean. Great Gift idea.
customer_reviews.text: This product was great! I didn't have to go to a fancy restaurant and spend hundreds. Additionally, I didn't need to dirty other pots and pans heating up cheese and chocolate. This was a great gift idea for an anniversary. It was easy to use and clean. I would highly recommend this over going to the restaurant.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor J.

customer_reviews.title: Good Pot
customer_reviews.text: I used this for the first time and it worked well it was just getting the right temperature. To melt cheese had to be a little higher and some of it scorched on bottom. Easy to clean and we had fun.
customer_reviews.author: awinters40

customer_reviews.title: I can make a cheese fondue and melt it down in less than 3 minutes and then hold it at a perfect temperature. I can boil an entire pot of ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used my fondue pots, I bought 2 to accommodate my large family, over a dozen times now. I can make a cheese fondue and melt it down in less than 3 minutes and then hold it at a perfect temperature. I can boil an entire pot of broth in less than 5 minutes. This fondue pot is the best! I love them so much that I bought 2 more, 1 for my mother and 1 for our RV!
customer_reviews.author: kblyt

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I have made cheese fondue a few times and also used it to re-heat the fondue after refrigerating the left overs for a couple weeks and it did great. Also used it for chocolate fondue using Toblerone and it was fabulous as well. Really happy with how easy it was to clean. I was a bit of a dork when trying to plug in the electrical cord to the piece that plugs in to the pot, so my advice is, "don't force anything, it clicks together easily so if you are having any trouble, stop - and turn the cord piece upside down and it will magnetically attach easily".
customer_reviews.author: Julie Jev

customer_reviews.title: There is a fine line between too cold and TOO hot
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2. The temperature is a little hard to control. There is a fine line between too cold and TOO hot. We still use it often, just have to be on your game with the temp.
customer_reviews.author: tnt12mom

customer_reviews.title: Touchy dial
customer_reviews.text: I had pretty low expectations for this fondue pot and I think they were basically met. It heats unevenly and the dial is basically useless as setting 2 will be too cold and setting 3 is suddenly too hot. It worked for what I needed but if you need some precise heating, look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Schurig

customer_reviews.title: Great for broth or oil fondue
customer_reviews.text: I gave this fondue pot a four star because 1. the cord is very short, and 2. I have to use a Univeral Double Boiler pot inside for the cheese and chocolate. If I didn't use this boiler pot then I wouldn't be able to use the fondue for all three courses. Other than these issues the pot is great and it is easy to clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Davis

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Fast and even heating
customer_reviews.text: I love this fondue pot. Be careful though, it heats up SUPER FAST (which is great!!) so don't leave something delicate sitting for more than a few seconds. I was surprised how hot even the third setting was. I haven't tried chocolate yet, but I've made cheese and broth fondues and this pot heated quickly and evenly. I also really like that it has a cover with slots to hold your forks. It even comes with a small recipe book. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried several different less expensive fondue makers and while they did the job, they just weren't big enough. I love to melt chocolate during the holidays and this fondue maker definitely handles a lot of chocolate.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie H.

customer_reviews.title: Great for meat fondue
customer_reviews.text: This was SO EASY to use. I was nervous about the temperature control, as we like to cook meat fondue, but it’s perfect! I haven’t tried it with cheese or chocolate yet, but I’m looking forward to trying!
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE This Fondue Pot!
customer_reviews.text: I’m new to fondue, and I’ve tried it with other pots that used a sterno gel to keep it warm. Nothing works like this electric pot. It’s so easy to control the temperature at the table. It’s easy to use and easy to clean. It makes fondue fun. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Estee Dahan

customer_reviews.title: We love making Cheese and chocolate fondue with this
customer_reviews.text: We love making Cheese and chocolate fondue with this. We cut our cheese(pepper jack) with some hard cider or beer to make it a good consistency. Make sure you turn the temperature down to 2ish once it's melted to prevent burning. With milk chocolate cut it with some 1/2&1/2 and maybe some Baily's or Kahlua and of course drop temp to 2ish after it melts to keep from burning.... and don't forget the rice crispy treats to dip!
customer_reviews.author: Ringo127

customer_reviews.title: Fast, efficient, accurate heating and fun fondue!
customer_reviews.text: Had this a couple years now and have yet to be disappointed. Excellent and fast heating. Heat control dial works great so I can move seamlessly from cheese to broth to chocolate fondues. Even brings broths to a boil within mere minutes (think 4!). Things that could be improved: larger bowl option and the top "plate"/skewer rest is a bit flimsy since it isn't attachable (just sets on top). But I absolutely love this set and am looking forward to buying another now the our for due nights are growing (and we need that additional bowl size referenced above).
customer_reviews.author: SJones

customer_reviews.title: Sits beautifully at table
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, easy to use . Heats well . Because the pot doesn’t separate from the base and electrical intake caution must be used when cleaning and this is a bit stressful
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great temperature control!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent temperature control and range. Temps range low enough to keep chocolate's temper or high enough to fry meat safely. Big basin that is fully submersible for easier cleaning. My only complaint would be the temp gauge is numbered so you have to fiddle around to find your temp range but it holds it well. Other than that a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: George Serena

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, clean and cook
customer_reviews.text: Enjoyed this fondue pot so much, I bought another one. Heats up quickly and manages temp very well. I’m impressed and made the process of making a full four course meal easy.
customer_reviews.author: Nicklaus B Sims

customer_reviews.title: Great design and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for fondue (perfect) and also for small batches of soup or stew. When company is coming, it is an easy way to have an extra pot of food staying warm without taking up room on the cook top.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Ashby

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Makes for really creative meals for all the family to enjoy. Easy to operate. Easy to clean. Only complaint is the cord is very short.
customer_reviews.author: UncleShecky

customer_reviews.title: fondue wonder
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made product. Heat up fast and controlled heating so nothing burns. Only con is handles get hot if on for some time.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Girl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: Daughter had slumber party during winter break and thought about a chocolate fountain and chose this instead due to ease of cleaning---it was a hit with the girls and as easy to clean as I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Verified Customer

customer_reviews.title: We bought these on his recommendation and had a wonderful experience throwing our own fondue party
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of these for my wife after we moved away from our friend who used to throw fondue parties. We bought these on his recommendation and had a wonderful experience throwing our own fondue party. The temperature never needs to go up that high - we kept ours around 3 for the cheeses, the broth, and maybe a little lower for the chocolate. As long as you keep an eye on what you're doing, it turns out great.
customer_reviews.author: KindaPicky

customer_reviews.title: Nice but way to big for what we need it for
customer_reviews.text: Returned it because the person I got it for said it was too big which it is, probably good at melting chocolate but a lot of chocolate like ALOT.
customer_reviews.author: Scottie Norris

customer_reviews.title: Easy clean up and easy to control heat!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second fondue pot that I have owned. I love this one. I can't recommend it enough. We make fondue about every other month. We typically just do cheese fondue. The clean up is very easy (which is usually the worst part of cheese fondue). The heat is easy to control and adjust which is super important! The booklet it comes with also has some great recipes.
customer_reviews.author: Debra McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: Love this fondue maker so
customer_reviews.text: Love this fondue maker so! We have used it three times and it each time our fondue came out yummy delicious. Make sure to keep the fondue maker on a low setting when dipping your veggies or bread so that the cheese does not start to solidify. ;)
customer_reviews.author: MelOG

customer_reviews.title: If you want REALLY HOT FONDUE, you can make ...
customer_reviews.text: If you want REALLY HOT FONDUE, you can make it with this. Obviously the temperature is adjustable, but I was surprised by how hot this little bugger can get. We were able to do a broth fondue and cook small pieces of meat in it, so yum!
customer_reviews.author: Renee Rockwood

customer_reviews.title: Oh, Yeah
customer_reviews.text: Best of all, the pot is washable in dishwasher or sink. Heat control is perfect and fondue from this pot is great.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: I never went back to using a burner fondue pan
customer_reviews.text: Simply fantastic! I bought it about 10 years ago and the nonstick material is still intact. Fits all types of fondue. Temperature control is effective. The only thing that displeases me is the size of the wire, needing an extension.
customer_reviews.author: Daniela Madeira

customer_reviews.title: Great fondue set that is easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: My kids and I like to use this setup for steak fondue. It's very easy to clean and accurate temperature control.
customer_reviews.author: Prime_Addict77

customer_reviews.title: as we all love to eat fondue
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift from my kids to me, as we all love to eat fondue. It works great, gets nice and hot so that it adequately cooks anything you put in it fairly quickly. It also heats up quickly which is a bonus when you have two hungry children staring you down! It's high quality, heavy duty, & easily cleaned. The only complaint I have that takes it from a 5 to 4 star is that the cord is very short which limits where you can use it.
customer_reviews.author: lisa roak

customer_reviews.title: Great fondue pot!
customer_reviews.text: This pot is fabulous. We had a Nostalgia one that never really heated up. This heated up quickly and held its temperature. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Jami M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Fondue Pot
customer_reviews.text: After I purchased I was nervous about some temp control reviews I saw, but we had no trouble at all and loved using it!
customer_reviews.author: Becky B.

customer_reviews.title: Best invest of the year hands down.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. We bought it a bit over a week ago and used it 5 times. Word of caution: Too much cheese is a bad thing. But seriously, it is awesome. The heat controls are amazing, the stainless steel is scratch resistant, it heats the food up quickly and keeps it warm throughout the meal, it makes eating a blast, and best of all, it is healthier than many other commonly ingested foods of America. I'm not kidding, I lost 6lbs this week. It is truly super enjoyable and even romantic if you use the right ingredients. The kids love it. All around must have for a big family or a couple. Best investment of the year hands down.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Gets hot & cleans easily
customer_reviews.text: Used this for Bagna Caulda. It got hot enough to cook the meat & vegetables. It was easy to regulate. Best of all, it cleaned up well. Loved it. I now have one for our cabin, two for me , & ordered one for my daughter who loved it too!!
customer_reviews.author: Stocktongirl

customer_reviews.title: Cheese/Chocolate
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research on fondue pots. Have eaten at The Melting Pot countless times, asked lots of questions... I chose this pot because of the reviews. This pot keeps a regulated temperature perfectly! I made a chocolate fondue - absolutely no problems. I also made a spinach/artichoke cheese fondue. I had one issue with it. Definitely could have been an error on my part, but I never could get the cheese and the broth to completely mix. The center of the pot would be the right consistency, but the outer edges were pure liquid. Again, it could be the combo of cheeses I used or something, cause the chocolate worked excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Angela C. Owen

customer_reviews.title: Great at holding the temps it is set at
customer_reviews.text: Bought six months ago, used 6+ times. Great at holding the temps it is set at. Wonderful for small parties. Only problem is the plug has a very short cable, so you will need a surge protector to reach any kind of table.
customer_reviews.author: Diana P.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for hot pot and fondue
customer_reviews.text: Works great for hot pot, cheese fondue, and chocolate fondue! Make sure to order a heavy duty (14 or 16G) extension so you can set this on a dinner table. I bought the StarTech 6ft Extension cord 16 AWG. So far, easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis T

customer_reviews.title: Would Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Although it's hard to clean because the pot doesn't detach, for the money its a decent product.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea G.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my family for Christmas and we love it. We use it all the time for cheese and chocolate fondue. Very easy to clean, the chocolate and cheese doesn't stick to the bowl and doesn't take up too much space so it's easy to store.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: At our fondue party I filled one with flavored vegetable oil and the other with chicken broth. They kept the contents hot and are wide enough many people could use at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love our fondue pot. This one is so easy to use and clean. Very nice looking. We have gathered around this fondue pot many times and have had many laughs and good food. This is top notch. Definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great deal.
customer_reviews.text: Gave it a 4 overall because of the fork holder. Doesn’t stay in place and seems poorly made. Otherwise the pot is great and works fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: bwilson

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We used this last night for the first time and loved it! It was a fun dinner with the kids. I wish it was a little bigger but it still worked fine for the four of us.
customer_reviews.author: CutieMama

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product. Great for cheese or chocolate, but the best is having some raw meat cut into cubes and everyone talking and taking a while to have dinner. Wonderful for family time.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki and Jim

customer_reviews.title: Easy and safe
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! Easy, quick supper. This fondue pot is easy to use and easy to clean. I did buy an appliance extension cord so it would reach the electrical outlet. I have been having so much fun with this!
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I love that this can be placed in the dishwasher. Easy to use, directions are clear. Have not tried the recipes yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amiee Nicole DeNiro

customer_reviews.title: Fondue You
customer_reviews.text: I had waited several years to purchase this type of fondue pot and when My interest final grew to total want. I purchaed and used it the first day it had arrived. This is the greatest thing to use when you throw a party. People just loved the cheese fondue I had made and kept coming back for more, so I ended up making three pot loads of beer fondue to satisfy everyone appetite. Most valued purchase to date would recommend to anyone that likes to treat friends and family to a fast and easy way to feed their hungry hoard. Shipper was outstanding and delivery was on schedule.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Brist

customer_reviews.title: Great Fondue Pot
customer_reviews.text: Love it but not easy to clean. Recommended way to clean is to clean when hot.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift for granddaughter, and she truly loves it, has used it successfully several times in the past couple months since she has had it. Clearly a product well made and top quality.
customer_reviews.author: CrowMan4

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Love this fondue set. I use it for all sorts of others things beyond fondue such awaking ganache. Very quick to heat up and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: kminyard

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use but cleaning is meh!
customer_reviews.text: I like this pot and I bought it instead of spending money on fondue dinners, i was like why not do it home! i like the temperature control not bad, but the cleaning is very difficult, not easy to clean at all, but it does the job. Make sure to buy an extra electric cord extension
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: Love our fondue maker. This product is great and I got it at a great price. Thanks Amazon for the price point. We need to buy another one soon!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase, one thing to be aware of.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great Cuisinart Product. Good size for 4 people, cooks evenly, is large and the stand makes it safe. Overall, very pleased. The one thing to be aware of is the length of the cord. It is a magnetic connection that disengages easily to avoid pulling the pot over (a good thing.) The cord is short, and will need an extension for most people. To avoid the extension from pulling and disengaging the connection, we taped it to the table. Not very attractive but worked fine. I would prefer unattractive than a pulled over pot of oil!
customer_reviews.author: Devo

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Would have given it 5 stars had it not been missing a temperature controller. I ordered two of these so I could use them at the same time and unfortunately one was missing a critical part. I am returning it for a replacement. With the one that did work it worked great for our "Melting Pot" evening of cheese, broth and chocolate fondue. This thing worked perfect with all three items and nothing burned. We are excite to have another night like this.
customer_reviews.author: Vykon

customer_reviews.title: Works great! But the connector to the pot does NOT ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great! But the connector to the pot does NOT ever stay connection and I kept having to hold it together. That’s ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

product_meta.title: Cuisinart CFO-3SS Electric Fondue Maker, Brushed Stainless, 6.12" x 10.50" x 7.00"
product_meta.description:
FONDUE MADE EASY!
Your party is sure to be a success with the elegant brushed stainless Cuisinart Electric Fondue Set! 

The 3-quart nonstick pot will accommodate all of your favorite fondue recipes, including chocolate, cheese, broth or oil. So call the family, or invite friends over to relax with a variety of great-tasting fondues, then enjoy easy, dishwasher safe cleanup.

PRODUCT PARTS


 1.  Eight individual fondue forks
    
 2.  Fondue ring
    
 3. Fondue bowl
    
 4. Qt. Stainless steel bowl with
    nonstick interior 
 5. Brushed stainless steel housing
    
 6. Adjustable temperature control probe



PRODUCT FEATURES


 *  3-quart capacity
   
 * Dishwasher-safe fondue pot
   
 * 1000 watts of power
   
 * Nonstick interior
   
 * Adjustable temperature probe with eight settings
   
 * Eight fondue forks
   
 * Stainless steel fork ring
   
 * Instruction/Recipe book
   
 * Limited 3-year warranty



ABOUT THE FONDUE POT
The fun of fondue gets a sleek and convenient makeover with the Cuisinart Electric Fondue Pot. Designed for use with oil, broth, chocolate, or cheese, the set combines powerful electric heat with easy temperature control and handsome but tidy construction. The 3-quart stainless-steel bowl is lined with nonstick coating for keeping heated foods from sticking, and the stand, bowl, ring, and temperature probe all assemble and disassemble easily. A combination of finishes—brushed on the bowl and ring, mirror on the stand and handles—gives the unit a contemporary flair. 

Heat up is efficient here--getting oil to 375 degrees F takes between 10 and 15 minutes. Best of all, you can change the temperature setting with a simple turn of the dial to adjust for different ingredients or the passage of time. For clean up, run the entire set (temperature probe and cord removed, of course) through the dishwasher. A set of eight color-coded fondue forks is also included. Fully assembled, the fondue maker stands 6-1/4 inches high; the bowl is 8-1/4 inches in diameter at the opening.
feature_bullets: Electric fondue set suitable for chocolate, cheese, broth or oil
Includes base, bowl, temperature probe, 8 fondue forks, and fork rack, BPA Free
Elegant, brushed stainless-steel 3-quart bowl with nonstick interior
Removable temperature control is adjustable for wide range of recipes;Product Built to North American Electrical Standards
